aircraft.value: Viper Strike-3 - AC-7338-902 at Sector West Station

defect_observed.value: Electronic warfare system false alerts. Abnormality observed during system test.

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Communication Suite component. Testing confirmed performance below acceptable limits.

corrective_action.value: Implement enhanced testing protocol before component installation

remarks_investigation.value: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.

remarks_design.value: Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions. Date: 15/03/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality aspects reviewed. Manufacturing process controls are adequate. Recommend supplier quality audit. Date: 18/03/2023 Signature: Dr. A.K. Sharma

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User feedback incorporated. Recommend enhanced crew training on system operation and limitations. Date: 18/03/2023 Signature: Dr. P.L. Mehta

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality oversight review completed. Recommend monitoring effectiveness of implemented preventive actions. Date: 18/03/2023 Signature: Dr. P.L. Mehta

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design authority review completed. Recommend continued airworthiness monitoring of affected component type. Date: 20/03/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Critical
b) Defect Observed: Electronic warfare system false alerts. Abnormality observed during system test.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Electromagnetic interference affecting sensor accuracy
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Communication Suite component.
Testing confirmed performance below acceptable limits.
c) Remedial Measures Implement enhanced testing protocol before component installation
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Establish periodic calibration schedule
d) Attributable Code: F - Failure/ageing/Corrosion/Material Failure
